contentrichtext.text: {{main|ISO 3166-2}} '''ISO 3166-2:MU''' is the entry for [[Mauritius]] in [[ISO 3166-2]], part of the [[ISO 3166]] [[standardization|standard]] published by the [[International Organization for Standardization]] (ISO), which defines [[code]]s for the names of the principal [[country subdivision|subdivision]]s (e.g., [[province]]s or [[state (administrative division)|state]]s) of all [[country|countries]] coded in [[ISO 3166-1]]. Currently for Mauritius, ISO 3166-2 codes are defined for [[districts of Mauritius|5 cities, 3 dependencies, and 9 districts]]. The five cities are former urban councils and are now part of a district. Each code consists of two parts, separated by a hyphen. The first part is <tt>MU</tt>, the [[ISO 3166-1 alpha-2]] code of Mauritius. The second part is two letters. ==Current codes== Subdivision names are listed as in the ISO 3166-2 standard published by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO 3166/MA). ''Click on the button in the header to sort each column.'' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Code ! Subdivision name ! Subdivision category |- | <tt>MU-BR</tt> | [[Beau Bassin-Rose Hill]] | city |- | <tt>MU-CU</tt> | [[Curepipe]] | city |- | <tt>MU-PU</tt> | [[Port Louis]] | city |- | <tt>MU-QB</tt> | [[Quatre Bornes]] | city |- | <tt>MU-VP</tt> | [[Vacoas-Phoenix]] | city |- | <tt>MU-AG</tt> | [[Agalega Islands]] | dependency |- | <tt>MU-CC</tt> | [[Cargados Carajos Shoals]] [Saint Brandon Islands] | dependency |- | <tt>MU-RO</tt> | [[Rodrigues Island]] | dependency |- | <tt>MU-BL</tt> | [[Black River District|Black River]] | district |- | <tt>MU-FL</tt> | [[Flacq District|Flacq]] | district |- | <tt>MU-GP</tt> | [[Grand Port District|Grand Port]] | district |- | <tt>MU-MO</tt> | [[Moka District|Moka]] | district |- | <tt>MU-PA</tt> | [[Pamplemousses District|Pamplemousses]] | district |- | <tt>MU-PW</tt> | [[Plaines Wilhems District|Plaines Wilhems]] | district |- | <tt>MU-PL</tt> | [[Port Louis District|Port Louis]] | district |- | <tt>MU-RR</tt> | [[Rivière du Rempart District|Rivière du Rempart]] | district |- | <tt>MU-SA</tt> | [[Savanne District|Savanne]] | district |} ==Changes== The following changes to the entry have been announced in newsletters by the ISO 3166/MA since the first publication of ISO 3166-2 in 1998: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Newsletter ! Date issued ! Description of change in newsletter ! Code/Subdivision change |- | id="I-4" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_3166-2_newsletter_i-4_en.pdf {{nowrap|Newsletter I-4}}] | {{nowrap|2002-12-10}} | Error correction: Duplicate use of one code element corrected. Subdivision categories in header re-sorted | style=white-space:nowrap | '''Codes:''' ''(to correct duplicate use)''<br /> [[Port Louis]] ''(city)'': <tt>MU-PL</tt> → <tt>MU-PU</tt> |} ==See also== * [[Subdivisions of Mauritius]] * [[List of FIPS region codes (M-O)#MP: Mauritius|FIPS region codes of Mauritius]] ==External links== * [http://www.statoids.com/umu.html Districts of Mauritius], Statoids.com {{ISO 3166}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Iso 3166-2:Mu}} [[Category:ISO 3166|2:MU]] [[Category:Districts of Mauritius|*ISO 3166-2]] [[Category:Mauritius geography-related lists]]
